name: Flow Your Screens (UI Flow Kit)
description:
Let's flow your screens!

Hello Figma people! 


This is a simple UI flow kit I made for you to connect your mockups and tell a better story!


All the flows are built with shared styles & components, so feel free to customize them as you want.


Let me know if you have any questions and suggestions via my email: linsimon.design@gmail.com. I will keep improving it and there are more to come!


Enjoy :)
